description: Request for Information (RFI) for business data analytics/services.
full_summary:
===================================== ### Request for Information: Business Data Analytics and Subscriptions The Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC), in collaboration with the Department of Public Services and Government (SPAC), is issuing a Request for Information (RFI) to gather input from suppliers on business data analytics and subscriptions, as well as business benchmarking services. ### RFI Number and Publication Date The RFI has been published under the following details: * Reference Number: WS4056796959-Doc4056819425 * Solicitation Number: WS4056796959 * RFI Number: WS4056796959-Doc4056819425 * Publication Date: June 19, 2023 ### Services Being Requested The PSPC and SPAC are seeking input from suppliers on the following services: * Business data analytics and subscriptions * Business benchmarking services These services will be used to assist Canada in refining its approach to procuring these services. ### Supply Arrangement Information The RFI is being issued as a result of the expected expiration of the current supply arrangement for business data analytics and subscriptions. This RFI aims to enhance the acquisition strategy for these services. ### Contracting Entity The PSPC is the contracting entity for this RFI, and the contact information for the procurement team is as follows: * Name: Tara Egan (SPAC/PSPC) * Email: [tara.egan@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:tara.egan@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca) ### Important Dates The RFI closing date and time is July 28, 2023, at 14:00 Eastern Standard Time. ### Evaluation Criteria The evaluation criteria for this RFI will be based on the responses provided by suppliers. ### Notice URL Please refer to the URL below for additional information on this RFI: * [http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/16597076](http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/16597076) Note, please check the notice URL for any attachments and updates related to this RFI. End of excerpt.
